game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the Lost Artifact from the Dragon's Den
game.description: The quest is to retrieve an ancient artifact that has been lost in the dragon's den. This artifact is said to have immense power and must not fall into the wrong hands.

task.objective: Find the location of the Dragon's Den
task.description: Locate the entrance to the Dragon's Den by deciphering the ancient map given to you by the Sage.
Once in the Dragon's Den, you must defeat the dragon guarding the artifact.
After defeating the dragon, find and retrieve the artifact.

task.objective: Return the Artifact to the Sage
task.description: Once you have the artifact, return it to the Sage in the village.
